title: Multilingual support
description: The scan service is available in multiple languages, allowing customers to use the service in the language they are most comfortable with.

title: Highly accurate analysis
description: The scan service can analyze transaction data on the blockchain with high accuracy, providing a clear understanding of market trends and transaction patterns.

title: Visualization
description: The scan service can display the results of the analysis using visualization tools such as graphs and charts, allowing you to intuitively understand the data.

title: API connectivity
description: The scan service supports API connectivity, allowing integration with other applications and services.

title: Security
description: The scan service has a high level of security to ensure that your privacy and security are taken into consideration.
